summary: Technical lead in the Family area of account.microsoft.com, where we help users keep kids safer online, have fun together, and stay connected.
Technical lead of the Services & Subscriptions area of account.microsoft.com, where users can manage their subscriptions (Office, Xbox Live, Xbox Game Pass, EAAccess…).
Implemented the Outline feature for Excel Online.
Built the front end of the MyAccount and Purchase pages of office.com.
Created a database design that improved reading data from databases 2000% and implemented a server application that allowed SQL queries to be performed in SQL Server, Oracle and PostgreSQL.
Refreshed all the computers in the organization which made employees be more productive as their computers were not running slowly anymore.
Coded an application with Visual Basic .Net that made the selection of the images that were going to be installed on new manufactured laptops easier and faster.
